    • Method Detail

      • getName

        @Nonnull
public String getName()
        Description copied from interface: Smartkey
        Useful for displaying in UIs. May change over time, so not good for programmatic filtering. An empty value indicates that human users should not be aware of this Smartkey.
        Specified by:
        getName in interface Smartkey
        Returns:
        may be empty

public String getUrn()
        Description copied from interface: Smartkey
        The URN for a Smartkey will never change.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        A globally unique identifier for this Smartkey

      • canManage

        public boolean canManage()
        Specified by:
        canManage in interface Smartkey
        Returns:
        true if this user is allowed to modify this smartkey. If false, attempts at modification will result in errors.

      • canEncrypt

        public boolean canEncrypt()
        Specified by:
        canEncrypt in interface Smartkey
        Returns:
        true if this user is allowed to encrypt using this smartkey. If false, attempts to retrieve the encryption key will throw an exception.

      • canDecrypt

        public boolean canDecrypt()
        Specified by:
        canDecrypt in interface Smartkey
        Returns:
        true if this user is allowed to decrypt using this smartkey. If false, attempts to retrieve the decryption key with throw an exception.

      • getKeyForDecryption

        @Nullable
public SecretKey getKeyForDecryption(int revision)
                                        throws MetaClientException
        Specified by:
        getKeyForDecryption in interface Smartkey
        Returns:
        null if no key is available for the given revision
        Throws:
        MetaClientException - if this key is not allowed to be used for decryption
        See Also:
